MajorClaims.Text: the physical education part should not be outweighed
the more attention is withdrawn to a problem of physical education, the more influence we can get on academic success of students

Claims.Text: Physical exercises help to create healthy nation, assist to learning through direct observation and finally aid to financial development of a country
if the entire nation, from their school ages begin going for sports and try doing that everyday, eventually it may help to build healthy nation
when we practice outdoors and indoors sports, many aspects are getting clearer
financial sustainability of a region mostly depends on how healthy the population is
putting physical activities in early steps of human development would finally lead to mentally healthy society

Premises.Text: healthy body is basis for healthy soul
There is a direct linkage between people's health and the frequency of doing physical exercises
The more we practice, the better we feel
there is a fact that one can improve health conditions with everyday physical activity: gradually, step by step we change physical condition to better
when a person goes jogging everyday, eventually he can understand his own body through direct observation
the school basketball team gains more knowledge on how to succeed in some particular kind of throwing the ball into hoot practicing rather than learning theoretically
almost all natural science discoveries were made by direct observation, which is a part of physical education
the money invested into physical education program can save allocations into healthcare
physically healthy people can contribute more both into economical and social development
the better a person feels, the better his brain works
it ends up with financially competitive country
